name: Heron
text:
I greet you, mortal! I am Heron.

I have been asked on the behalf of the Gathering of the Seven Flying Spirits to arrange an evening entertainment on our first day of the Gathering.

We will have a week-long meeting after that where we aim to decide upon many important matters, and bring clarity, order and simplicity to the world above you â€“ the sky.
positiveFeedback:
We were very amused by your lightning-display. A most pleasureable experience that brought clarity and calm to the rest of our Gathering.

I thank you most graciously for your meticulous work! The Gathering could not be more pleased!
negativeFeedback:
No, this was not what I was hoping for.

I am telling you again: I seek clarity and order...!

The Gathering was a failure! The only thing we could agree upon was to disagree. Shame on you for disturbing the peace in the sky!
neutralFeedback: Hm. That will have to do. Good evening.
